summary: Provides a collection of general‑purpose helper utilities used throughout the Annif subject indexing system, including safe atomic file saving, simple type conversion helpers, URI sanitisation, result merging, metric code handling, and command‑line argument and source configuration parsing.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable core functionality of the Annif indexing platform by offering reusable utilities for file I/O safety, data preprocessing, configuration parsing and result handling, thereby reducing duplication and improving robustness.
